entry.title: Saturday night: Wet flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Wet flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
